DOC.brief_summary: Objective- To see use heat home physical therapy session result well therapy outcomes people acute neck pain . Setting : Physical Therapy outpatient rehabilitation center Participants : 90 people acute nonspecific neck pain broken 4 group . Intervention : All subject undergo 45 minute therapy 2 time per week 2 week . All subject accomplish 1 hour therapeutic exercise home day therapy . Thirty subject use ThermaCare neck wrap home exercise , 30 use Ibuprofen plus ThermaCare neck wrap home exercise , 15 use sham heat wrap Ibuprofen placebo day ( 1200 mg / day ) last 15 control conventional physical therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Use ThermaCare Heat Wraps Ibuprofen Adjunct Physical Therapy Neck Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Neck pain patient admit outpatient physical therapy program randomly assign either control 3 experimental group . An initial evaluation rehabilitation program establish include home exercise program . Therapy 2 day per week 2 week . Thirty subject use ThermaCare continuous heat neck wrap apply 6 hour home exercise , 30 use ibuprofen ( 1200 mg /day give 3 dosage ) plus ThermaCare neck wrap home exercise , 15 use sham heat wrap Ibuprofen placebo day last 15 conventional therapy . Intervention heat Ibuprofen use day treat clinic . All group evaluate initially 2 week . They give home exercise heat compliance log analog visual pain scale fill night exercise , use heat , heat apply . The physical therapist also ask evaluate home compliance , pain benefit heat pack . Subjects complete neck disability questionnaire begin end study . At end two week treatment , multivariate ANOVA perform compare change home exercise compliance , functional level , pain level , range motion , strength . A statistical level pâ‰¤.05 consider predictive difference group .
DOC.criteria: age 1880 year neck pain caused fracture spinal damage undergone neck surgery within last year radiculopathy diagnose diabetes exclude study
